info.description: REST API for user Aroma Sense Eccomerce
info.title: Aroma Sense API

get.description: Returns paginated list of orders with optional filters (status, date range)

post.description: Creates a new product with image upload (Admin only)

400.description: Invalid request data or missing image

get.description: Retrieves a specific product by its ID (Admin only)

400.description: Invalid product ID or request data

get.description: Retrieves the shopping cart for the authenticated user with items, quantities and totals

200.description: User's cart with items and totals

post.description: Adds a product to the user's shopping cart. If item already exists, increases quantity.

parameters.description: Product ID and quantity to add
parameters.name: request

400.description: Invalid request body or insufficient stock

delete.description: Removes all items from the user's cart, returning an empty cart

200.description: Empty cart after clearing all items

delete.description: Removes a specific item from the user's cart completely

patch.description: Updates the quantity of a specific item in the user's cart. If quantity is 0, removes the item.

400.description: Invalid request body, item ID, or insufficient stock

404.description: Cart item or product not found

get.description: Returns the list of orders for the authenticated user

post.description: Creates a new order from the user's cart, validates stock, deducts products, and clears the cart

400.description: Invalid request data or empty cart

get.description: If `query` is provided, returns a paginated search envelope; otherwise returns the latest products (backwards-compatible).

200.description: Search results envelope (when query is present)

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific product
Returns published reviews for a product in descending creation order.

post.description: Creates a review for a delivered product. Requires authentication, a display_name set, and at least one delivered order containing the product. One review per user/product.

get.description: Returns average rating, total review count, and rating distribution for a product.
Returns a list of shipping options (carrier, service code, price, ETA) for the current cart.

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token and user info.
Invalidates refresh token and clears refresh cookie.

get.description: Returns the authenticated user's profile information.

patch.description: Updates profile fields such as display_name.

post.description: Uses the HttpOnly refresh_token cookie to issue a new short-lived access token.
Creates a new user account with the provided information.

400.description: Invalid request (missing fields, invalid email) or email already registered

post.description: Validates the reset code and updates the user's password. Returns generic errors to avoid revealing whether email/code exists.

400.description: Invalid request, invalid/expired code, or weak password

post.description: Sends a 6-digit code to the user's email if it exists. Always returns success to avoid revealing whether the email is registered.

200.description: If the email exists, a reset code has been sent

dto.ProductResponse.description: Product information returned by the API

dto.UpdateProductRequest.description: Product update request (all fields are optional)

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
